description: Sum of first n composite numbers.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: A053767 := proc(n)        add(A002808(i),i=1..n) ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 03 2011ListTools[PartialSums](remove(isprime,[$2..1000])); # _Robert Israel_, Jan 09 2015
mathematica: lst={};s=0;Do[If[ !PrimeQ[n], s=s+n;AppendTo[lst, s]], {n, 2, 10^2}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Aug 14 2008 *)Accumulate[Complement[Range[2,100],Prime[Range[PrimePi[100]]]]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 28 2010 *)Accumulate[Select[Range[2, 100], ! PrimeQ[#] &]]
prog: (Haskell)a053767 n = a053767_list !! (n-1)a053767_list = scanl1 (+) a002808_list -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 03 2011(PARI) lista(nn) = {s = 0; forcomposite (n=0, nn, s += n; print1(s, ", "););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jan 09 2015
author: _G. L. Honaker, Jr._, Mar 29 2000
